original_text: Then I saw what seemed to be a glass sea. Fire was mixed in it. I also saw people who were standing at the edge of the glass sea. Those people had fought against the wild animal and they had won. They had won against its image and the number that means its name. They had fought and they had won. God had given them harps. They held the harps to make music.
korean_text: 또 내가 보니 불이 섞인 유리 바다 같은 것이 있고 짐승과 그의 우상과 그의 이름의 수를 이기고 벗어난 자들이 유리 바다 가에 서서 하나님의 거문고를 가지고

sentences.original_text: Then I saw what seemed to be a glass sea.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 유리 바다 같은 것을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: who were standing at the edge of the glass sea.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 유리 바다 가장자리에 서 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Those people had fought against the wild animal
They had won against its image
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 짐승의 형상에 대해 이겼습니다.

sentences.original_text: and the number that means its name.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 이름을 의미하는 숫자에도 이겼습니다.

sentences.original_text: They had fought and they had won.
They held the harps to make music.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 음악을 만들기 위해 수금을 들고 있었습니다.
